疾.definition: (bound form) disease; ailment; (bound form) swift; (literary) to hate; to abhor

疾惡如仇.definition: variant of 嫉惡如仇|嫉恶如仇[ji2e4-ru2chou2]

疾控中心.definition: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC); abbr. for 疾病預防控製中心|疾病预防控制中心[ji2 bing4 yu4 fang2 kong4 zhi4 zhong1 xin1]

疾病控制中心.pinyin: ji2 bing4 kong4 zhi4 zhong1 xin1

疾病預防中心.pinyin: ji2 bing4 yu4 fang2 zhong1 xin1

疾苦.definition: pain and difficulties; suffering (of the people)

疾風勁草.definition: lit. sturdy grass withstands high winds (idiom); fig. strength of character is revealed in a crisis

疾風知勁草.definition: lit. sturdy grass withstands high winds (idiom); fig. strength of character is revealed in a crisis

疾風知勁草，烈火見真金.pinyin: ji2 feng1 zhi1 jin4 cao3 , lie4 huo3 jian4 zhen1 jin1
疾風知勁草，烈火見真金.definition: lit. sturdy grass withstands high winds and true gold stands the test of fire (idiom); fig. strength of character is revealed in a crisis

疾首.definition: extremely angry; infuriated; enraged; headache caused by anger

疾馳而過.definition: to sweep past; to hurtle past; to swoosh past

疾駛.definition: (of a vehicle) to travel at high speed
